name: PentaCATS
description:
Enjoy excellent penta-block game with retro design and modern gameplay!
Only true penta figures during fall you can MOVE, ROTE and FLIP to make gameplay more interesting!
No tetra and simpler figures -- only penta-magic!
Welcome to dynamic mind-logic challenge!

Features:
You can ROTATE and FLIP figures.
You get score for dropping figures and for erasing lines.
You can see last drop result.
You can choose one of FOUR(!) types of game:

Four types of game are:
PentaCats -- drop penta figures using flip function;
TetraCats -- drop tetra figures using flip function;
Penta Blocks -- drop penta-to-uno figures without flip function (classic penta block game);
Tetra Blocks -- drop tetra figures without flip function (classic tetra block game).

Challenge each of the four leaderboards!

How to play:
Swipe to move LEFT or RIGHT.
Swipe down to drop.
Swipe up to FLIP.
Tap to ROTATE.
Or use buttons.

More erasing lines at one drop -- more scores!
Hide next figures to get more scores!
Beat all records in Game Center!
Enjoy cats in penta-blocks!
